alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Madison (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:46AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, southwestern Madison, eastern Swain and northwestern Haywood Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 646 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Newport to 6 miles northwest of Bryson City. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sylva, Bryson City, Cherokee, Maggie Valley, Dillsboro, Smoky Mountains-Deep Creek, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, B.R. Parkway-Smoky Mountains To Balsam Gap, Smoky Mountains-Cataloochee and Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
